div.p: Setup: The setup section defines the 7 value sets that are used to test the API functionality. The 7 value sets span common extensional and intensional definition styles and consequences.

Suite 3: A set of membership tests for each of the valuesets. Check, for each value set, a valid code, and various kinds of invalid codes. Some value sets have additional variations. In all cases, the code to test is passed as code, system and (optionally) display parameters in the URL. These tests are highly repetitive. Overview of value sets:

ul.li: extensional-case-1: An enumeration of codes from a FHIR defined code system
extensional-case-2: An enumeration of codes from LOINC
extensional-case-3: An enumeration of codes from SNOMED
extensional-case-4: An enumeration of codes the crosses code systems, with codes from a FHIR defined value set and the V3 Role code system
intensional-case-1: A selection of codes from LOINC by their system value
intensional-case-2: A selection of codes from SNOMED based on subsumption
intensional-case-3: All clinical findings from SNOMED (based on subsumption) - a value set that is too large to expand

name.value: FHIR Connectathon 14 - Terminology Services - Validate Code - Server - XML

description.value: FHIR Connectathon 14 - Terminology Services - Validate Code - Server - XML Format - A set of membership validation tests for each of the 7 ValueSet fixtures. Checks are performed for valid codes and various invalid codes. Setup creates the ValueSet resources with server defined resource ids.
ValueSet create, read and $validate-code operations

Search for the extensional-case-1 ValueSet by the url. This is necessary in order to determine the server assigned resource id and requires the desination server to also support the url search parameter.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).

Search for the extensional-case-2 ValueSet by the url. This is necessary in order to determine the server assigned resource id and requires the desination server to also support the url search parameter.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).

Search for the extensional-case-3 ValueSet by the url. This is necessary in order to determine the server assigned resource id and requires the desination server to also support the url search parameter.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).

Search for the intensional-case-3 ValueSet by the url. This is necessary in order to determine the server assigned resource id and requires the desination server to also support the url search parameter.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Check that the code {http://hl7.org/fhir/patient-contact-relationship}emergency is in the value set.
Test $validate-code operation on ValueSet extensional-case-1 for a valid code.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is XML.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Parameters.
Confirm that the returned Parameters minimally contains the information in validate-code-valid-min.
Check that the code {http://hl7.org/fhir/patient-contact-relationshipX}emergency is not in the value set.
Test $validate-code operation on ValueSet extensional-case-1 for an invalid code.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is XML.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Parameters.
Confirm that the returned Parameters minimally contains the information in validate-code-invalid-min.

Test $validate-code operation on ValueSet extensional-case-1 for an invalid code.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is XML.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Parameters.
Confirm that the returned Parameters minimally contains the information in validate-code-invalid-min.
